title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 16 December 2015 - XWiki
content:
<benoitc> has quit  
00:51 <benoitc> has joined #xwiki  
01:38 <cjd> has quit  
06:38 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:12 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
07:23 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
07:33 <mflorea> has quit  
07:34 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:36 <mflorea> has quit  
07:51 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
08:08 <Pbas> has quit  
08:10 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
08:22 <cjd> has quit  
08:41 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
08:43 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:53 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:04 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:11 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
09:33 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <vmassol> good morning  
09:41 <vmassol> done on my side gdelhumeau for my last commit for M2  
09:44 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <vmassol> has quit  
09:49 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:49 <vmassol1> Enygma`: good morning  
09:50 <vmassol1> wouldn't it be better to implement http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki74M2#HSupportfortemplatehierarchies with a query string param?  
09:50 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
09:50 <vmassol> (to decide if children should be copied or not)  
09:51 <Enygma`> Hi  
09:52 <Enygma`> what usecases do you have?  
09:52 <Enygma`> right now that only happens if you have the ?template parameter  
09:52 <gdelhumeau> Hi  
09:53 <gdelhumeau> We have http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/testReport/org.xwiki.test.selenium/AdministrationTest/testLockingAndUnlocking/ which is failing on the CI, but not locally  
09:53 <gdelhumeau> it seems it fails to create a new window during the integration test  
10:07 <Ramona1> has quit  
10:07 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <vmassol> Enygma`: I don't have a use case, but since xwiki is a platform I'm sure people will find use cases. We can wait till we have one though :) This was a minor comment BTW. It's very cool that we have this feature now :)  
10:11 <vmassol> users will love it  
10:12 <Enygma`> vmassol: I worked with the limited information from the issue and with my imagination :)  
10:12 <Enygma`> there is definitely room for improvement  
10:14 <gdelhumeau> I'm going to release 7.4m2  
10:15 <gdelhumeau> any blocker from your points?  
10:15 <vmassol> not from my pov  
10:15 <vmassol> (for my issues I mean)  
10:24 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
10:25 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:45 <gdelhumeau> grr finally I reproduced http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/testReport/org.xwiki.test.selenium/AdministrationTest/testLockingAndUnlocking/ locally  
10:45 <gdelhumeau> maybe because I have only one screen today  
10:50 <Slashman> has quit  
11:15 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: I think https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/0e91ab46673e518112861e793d83b2555b42cb03 have impacted http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/testReport/org.xwiki.test.selenium/AdministrationTest/testLockingAndUnlocking/  
11:15 <gdelhumeau> because a new RedirectClass object is added to a tested page  
11:15 <gdelhumeau> and then the test is not done on the correct page (because of the redirection)  
11:16 <gdelhumeau> could you check?  
11:22 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
11:23 <vmassol> has quit  
11:26 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <mflorea> gdelhumeau: indeed, looks like the test needs to uncheck the auto redirect option, I'll modify the test  
11:37 <gdelhumeau> thx  
12:08 <msmeria> hello  
12:09 <msmeria> on which project can I report an issue on Jira related to http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Multipage+PDF+Export?  
12:09 <msmeria> this is an extension that doesn't have a project in Jira  
12:09 <msmeria> there was a generic XWiki Contrib project some time ago, but it's been removed  
12:21 <evalica> msmeria: I don't seem to find the place to report. You might need to send a mail on the mailinglist to request for a issue tracker project.  
12:23 <msmeria> evalica: thanks!  
12:24 <evalica> msmeria: you should contact the lead developer and ask if such a tracker exists. Although I don't see any issue on commits  
12:25 <evalica> msmeria: talking with the lead might also get an impression if the project is still active and if the issue has a chance to be fixed  
12:26 <msmeria> evalica: ok. thanks for the suggestions :)  
12:26 <evalica> :)  
12:35 <vmassol1> Ramona2: hi  
12:35 <Ramona2> hi  
12:35 <vmassol1> I feel that http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/downloadrev/Extension/Active+Installs+Server+Application/activeinstalls.png?rev=1.1 was nicer that your new version, wdyt?  
12:35 <vmassol1> it was more comprehensive  
12:35 <vmassol1> (seeing more)  
12:35 <vmassol1> see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/viewattachrev/Extension/Active+Installs+Server+Application/activeinstalls.png  
12:36 <vmassol1> not sure why it was updated since the style is the same...  
12:36 <Ramona2> Flamingo theme  
12:36 <Ramona2> that's why i wanted to change it  
12:37 <vmassol1> ok but then you should never loose data when you redo images  
12:37 <vmassol1> otherwise it's a pity  
12:37 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
12:37 <Ramona2> and i tried to make it 960px but the text was very small  
12:37 <vmassol> don't forget that  
12:37 <vmassol> 1) you can use the width param  
12:38 <vmassol> 2) users can click on it  
12:38 <vmassol> (to see the full image)  
12:38 <vmassol> has quit  
13:48 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
13:52 <msmeria> has quit  
14:09 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
14:18 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:20 <vmassol> thanks Ramona2 (sorry I dropped the connection)  
14:20 <Ramona2> don't worry. :)  
14:22 <vmassol> msmeria1: Hi, has someone created the jira project for you already?  
14:23 <vmassol> msmeria1: regarding "The application doesn't seem to be compatible with XWiki 7.1.3. " have you updated the Tested On section on the extension page?  
14:24 <vmassol> hmm it says it works on that page...  
14:24 <vmassol> Ramona2: any idea? (don't know if it's you who tested it)  
14:24 <vmassol> maybe you could check with msmeria1?  
14:25 <msmeria1> vmassol: since I didn't get any reply to my mail asking for a Jira project, I suspect it's not created yet  
14:26 <msmeria1> as for the Tested On section, it's technically correct, since I did test it on 7.1.3, but it does not work :)  
14:27 <msmeria1> I can update that section with a link to the Jira issue once I have the project to report  
14:28 <msmeria1> is now known as <msmeria>  
14:28 <vmassol> msmeria: done  
14:29 <vmassol> tested on must say it if it doesn't work :)  
14:29 <vmassol> otherwise it doesn't help much ;)  
14:29 <msmeria> ok, I'll update it  
14:29 <msmeria> thanks  
14:32 <tmortagne> yes the whole point of this section is to indicate the result of the test

15:12 <gdelhumeau> it does not seem good: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.appwithinminutes/WizardTest/testCreateApplication/  
15:13 <gdelhumeau> but I did not get this error the first time it has been built on the ci :/  
15:17 <tmortagne> has quit  
15:18 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
15:33 <gdelhumeau> I cannot reproduce locally  
15:33 <gdelhumeau> I start the release  
15:44 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
15:53 <gdelhumeau> shit I finally reproduce http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.test.ui.appwithinminutes/WizardTest/testCreateApplication/ locally (using -U with mvn was a better idea to test the last version)

17:13 <gdelhumeau> [ANN] XWiki 7.4-m2 release is done on maven  
17:13 <gdelhumeau> you can push your commits  
17:18 <ekarlso> has joined #xwiki  
17:25 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:38 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
17:47 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
17:50 <abusenius\_> has joined #xwiki  
17:54 <abusenius\_> has quit  
18:05 <vmassol> does anyone know if this is a flicker http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-6.4.x/lastCompletedBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.annotations/AnnotationsTest/AddAndDeleteAnnotations/ ?  
18:05 <vmassol> "Failing for the past 8 builds"  
18:05 <vmassol> I couldn't find it in jira though  
18:06 <evalica> vmassol: it is not marked as flicker yet  
18:06 <evalica> vmassol: It was failing on 7.1.x too. I've run it locally and it passed.  
18:07 <vmassol> evalica: ok thanks  
18:07 <vmassol> have you added it to jira? :)  
18:07 <evalica> there it was failing for the past 5 builds  
18:08 <evalica> nope - since flicker means that it needs to pass and fail more often? :) I was not sure about the failing age… still waiting for an opinion
